job_tasks.phrase: AI-gedreven automations ontwikkelen: Je zet slimme workflows op in tools als Make.com, Bubble en Webflow, waarbij je generatieve AI-modellen (OpenAI, Claude, etc.) inzet om processen snel en efficiënt te laten verlopen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the development of automated workflows and the integration of generative AI models into these processes using specific tools, which falls under building and integrating functional systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Webapps bouwen en optimaliseren: Je creëert en onderhoudt schaalbare webapplicaties met no-code tools, afgestemd op de behoeftes van onze klanten.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase explicitly states the creation and maintenance of web applications, which is a core software development task, even when using no-code tools.

job_tasks.phrase: Integraties ontwerpen: Je koppelt verschillende systemen (o.a. Airtable, CRM, Marketingtools) naadloos aan elkaar en zorgt voor stabiele dataflows.
job_tasks.justification: The task involves connecting disparate systems and ensuring data flows between them, which is a key aspect of software integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Adviseren en meedenken: Je adviseert klanten en collega's over de beste no-code aanpak en combineert AI- en automation-oplossingen om tot écht innovatieve toepassingen te komen.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase highlights advising on approaches and combining AI/automation solutions to meet business needs and create innovative applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Probleemoplossend werken: Je duikt graag de techniek in om bottlenecks te achterhalen en creatieve workarounds te bedenken.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase directly refers to delving into technical issues to find bottlenecks and devise creative solutions, which is the essence of problem-solving.

soft_skills.justification: Advising clients and colleagues implies communication and collaboration to understand needs and propose solutions.
The phrase directly refers to identifying and solving technical problems.

profile.rationale: The job primarily involves building and integrating applications and workflows using no-code tools (Macro-Category A tasks). These applications directly incorporate generative AI models, making it an AI-adjacent role where AI is a core component of the software being developed.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is clear, specific about the tools and tasks, and the role's focus on integrating AI into no-code applications is well-defined, allowing for a confident classification.
